ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In the name of Allah, All-Merciful, Most Merciful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In the name of Allah, the Merciful, the Compassionate
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah - beginning with the name of - the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: In the Name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: ﻿In the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In the Name of Allah, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In the Name of Allah, the Merciful, the Most Merciful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [1:1] In the Name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
